block.p: CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed C Jesse Levis on the disabled list. Sent C Manny Romero from Akron of the Eastern League to Buffalo of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled OF Jeremy Giambi from Sacramento of the Pacific Coast League. Released OF Rich Becker. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Sent LHP Clayton Andrews to Syracuse of the International League. Recalled INF Chris Woodward from Syracuse.

CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed C Jesse Levis on the disabled list. Sent C Manny Romero from Akron of the Eastern League to Buffalo of the International League. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled OF Jeremy Giambi from Sacramento of the Pacific Coast League. Released OF Rich Becker. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Sent LHP Clayton Andrews to Syracuse of the International League. Recalled INF Chris Woodward from Syracuse.

ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Placed RHP Matt Mantei on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Vincente Padilla from Tucson of the Pacific Coast League. ATLANTA BRAVES--Placed C Eddie Perez and SS Walt Weiss on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 4. Purchased the contracts of INF Mark DeRosa from Richmond of the International League and C Fernando Lunar from Greenville of the Southern League. FLORIDA MARLINS--Activated 2B Luis Castillo from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 2B Pablo Ozuna to Portland of the Eastern League. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Placed OF Devon White and SS Kevin Elster on the 15-day disabled list. Activated RHP Antonio Osuna from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Joey Cora from Albuquerque of the Pacific Coast League. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Activated CF Ruben Rivera and RHP Rodney Myers from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF-OF John Roskos from Las Vegas of the Pacific Coast League. Placed RHP Woody Williams on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to May 2. Optioned INF David Newhan and RHP Buddy Carlyle to Las Vegas.

NFL--Announced the resignation of Ron Bernard, president of NFL Enterprises. GREEN BAY PACLERS--Signed LB Mike Morton. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Promoted Gene Smith to director of college scouting and Chris Driggers to regional college scout. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Re-signed CB Ray Hill. Signed WR Damon Savage.
